name: Woodland (Magniill Studios)
description:
This game was inspired by Minecraft, a game made by Mojang and The DevainArt Team.

Note: this MAY REALEASE on 2027, so please wait until I announce the game is released. Thank you for your patience.

Woodland is a pixel-survival game made by Magniill using Unity. All art's and stuff are made by Magniill.
